response.overview: Four men from different parts of the globe, all hiding from their pasts in the same remote South American town, agree to risk their lives transporting several cases of dynamite (which is so old that it is dripping unstable nitroglycerin) across dangerous jungle terrain.
response.tagline: Four men...outlaws thrown together by fate...share a fantastic adventure and risk the only thing they have left to lose.
response.title: Sorcerer
